A4.text: Toyota entered the United States market in 1958

A5.text: 모든 미국 시장 진입은 1958년에 이루어졌으며, 이는 1957년이라는 주장과 모순된다.

A6.text: In 1957, the Crown became the first Japanese car to be exported to the United States

A7.text: The first Japanese vehicles to arrive in the American continents were five Land Cruisers in El Salvador in May 1953
